dmca.title: Infringement Notification
dmca.body:
Tsekeris Vagelis
1 Skra Str Marousi 15124 Greece
Tel/fax: 30 210 61 96 991

Greciaturismo.com

To: Google.com
Att Google Legal Support, DMCA complaints
From: Vagelis Tskeris-greciaturismo.com
Subjec: Infringement Notification
Fax: 0016509633255
Date: March 15, 2007
Pages: 2

It has come to our attention that the domain www.vacanzeingrecia.com are displaying Copyrighted text from our web site: greciaturismo.com

We have written the owners of www.vacanzeingrecia.com and requested the removal of the offending web pages. The owners has not responded to our demand.

We request that you review www.vacanzeingrecia.com and immediately remove.

All the internal pages of these web site are copied from our www.greciaturismo.com website.

Google indexed these web pages:
Query: allinurl:www.vacanzeingrecia.com
